name: Guaco

Back: Pain between scapula, extending to forearm
Weariness through hips and lumbar region
Female: Itching and smarting at night, as if fire were running out of parts
Throat: Tongue feels heavy, difficult to move
Larynx and trachea constricted; difficult deglutition
Extremities: Pain in deltoid, shoulders, elbows, arms, and fingers

details: Headache, red face. Heaviness and difficulty in moving tongue.Acts on nervous system and female organs. Antidote to bites of scorpions and serpents. (GOLONDRINA.) Cholera. BULBAR PARALYSIS. SYPHILIS. Cancer. Deafness - tongue heavy and difficult to move. SPINAL IRRITATION. Spinal symptoms most marked and verified. Beer drinkers threatened with apoplexy. DIARRHOEA AND DYSENTERY WITH ACHING IN SACRUM AND LOINS.
